William Zujkowski
├─ Software Developer & Dad Joke Enthusiast
├─ 35 years of debugging life & code
├─ Powered by coffee ☕ and curiosity 🔍
└─ Making the world better, one commit at a time

ABOUT ME
========

🚀 Full-stack developer with a passion for clean code
📊 Data enthusiast who loves turning chaos into insights
🎮 Raspberry Pi wizard building retro gaming magic
🏠 Smart home automator (except the thermostat!)
👨‍👧‍👦 Professional dad joke teller (kids' eye rolls included)

I believe in:
  • Writing code that my future self will thank me for
  • Documentation that actually helps
  • Tests that actually test things
  • Coffee before commits

🚀 CURRENT PROJECTS
==================

📊 Personal Knowledge Graph System
   Building a Neo4j-powered system to organize and connect ideas
   Status: In Development | Stack: Python, Neo4j, React

🎮 RetroPi Gaming Station
   Custom Raspberry Pi build with 500+ classic games
   Status: v2.0 Released | Kids' Approval: 100%

🤖 AI-Powered Dad Joke Generator
   Because the world needs more groans
   Status: Complete | Groan Level: Maximum

🏠 Smart Home Automation Hub
   Everything connected except the thermostat (it's sacred)
   Status: Ongoing | Wife Approval: Pending

🎭 DAD JOKE GENERATOR 9000™
==========================

Calibrating groan levels...
Dad mode: ACTIVATED

📢 "Why don't scientists trust atoms?"

    "Because they make up everything!"
